warning_message.warning_text: Because of all the media attention our stores are struggling to keep the stocks up. As of March 31 2017, we have a limited supply of products to ship within 24 hours.

header.header_top_text: Increase the effectiveness of training at least 7 times!

header_after_title.first_line: pre-training complex of a new generation
header_after_title.second_line: with a high content of geranium extract

header_points.header_point_2: Improves brain and physical activity by 300%
header_points.header_point_3: Effects rapid fat burning and muscle mass gain
header_points.header_point_4: The most popular pre-training complex in the world

for_those.section_title: For those who do not want to be lazy and skip workouts
for_those.first_p: Each day we’re effected by many factors: work, stress, increasing fatigue, bad weather etc. Someday it’s hard to fight your will to stay at home and skip the training.

arrow.regular_text: We represent you a new pre-training complex

for_those.second_p: - a special drink that activates the forces inside of you, eliminates laziness, lift ups mood and adds maximum energy.
for_those.third_p: No matter how tired you may be, you will not only have the strength and desire for training, but its effectiveness will increase
